text: Hi all! I'd like to ask, can we add a custom ID to a reusable section just like we add a custom class.
Hi all, I added the screenshot of my theme to the json but itâ€™s not showing up when I preview. Could it be caching? Does it need to be specific dimensions?
Someone else participating on the Accelerator?
I did experience caching problems a lot during theme development. Did you try to reload multiple times?
Hi <@U033Q9L18F9>. I experienced this too during theme development. It might be caching issue. Try reloading the page multiple times or you can also check the image's visibility on a new portal.
